verses.text: The \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* of \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amoz|strong="H0531"\w*, which he \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* concerning \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*, \add and\add* \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, O \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, I have \w nourished|strong="H1431"\w* and brought \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and they have \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* against me.

The \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* his \w owner|strong="H7069"\w*, and the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* his \w master’s|strong="H1167"\w* \w crib|strong="H0018"\w*: \add but\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* doth not \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* doth not \w consider|strong="H0995"\w*.

\w Ah|strong="H1945"\w* \w sinful|strong="H2398"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w laden|strong="H3515"\w* with \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, a \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w*, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* that are \w corrupters|strong="H7843"\w*: they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, they have \w provoked|strong="H5006"\w* the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto \w anger|strong="H5006"\w*, they are gone \w away|strong="H2114"\w* \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft laden: Heb. of heaviness\f*\f + \fr 1.4 \ft gone…: Heb. alienated, or, separated\f*

¶ Why should ye be \w stricken|strong="H5221"\w* any more? ye will \w revolt|strong="H5627"\w* more and \w more|strong="H3254"\w*: the whole \w head|strong="H7218"\w* is \w sick|strong="H2483"\w*, and the whole \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w faint|strong="H1742"\w*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft revolt…: Heb. increase revolt\f*

From the \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* even unto the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \add there is\add* no \w soundness|strong="H4974"\w* in it; \add but\add* \w wounds|strong="H6482"\w*, and \w bruises|strong="H2250"\w*, and \w putrifying|strong="H2961"\w* \w sores|strong="H4347"\w*: they have not been \w closed|strong="H2115"\w*, neither bound \w up|strong="H2280"\w*, neither \w mollified|strong="H7401"\w* with \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft ointment: or, oil\f*

Your \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, your \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add are\add* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: your \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* it in your presence, and \add it is\add* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, as \w overthrown|strong="H4114"\w* by \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft overthrown…: Heb. the overthrow of\f*

And the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* is \w left|strong="H3498"\w* as a \w cottage|strong="H5521"\w* in a \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, as a \w lodge|strong="H4412"\w* in a garden of \w cucumbers|strong="H4750"\w*, as a \w besieged|strong="H5341"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w Except|strong="H3884"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* had \w left|strong="H3498"\w* unto us a very \w small|strong="H4592"\w* \w remnant|strong="H8300"\w*, we should have \w been|strong="H1961"\w* as \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \add and\add* we should have been \w like|strong="H1819"\w* unto \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*.

¶ \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye \w rulers|strong="H7101"\w* of \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*; give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* unto the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, ye \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*.

To \w what|strong="H4100"\w* purpose \add is\add* the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of your \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* unto me? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: I am \w full|strong="H7646"\w* of the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* of \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of fed \w beasts|strong="H4806"\w*; and I \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* not in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, or of \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, or of he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*.\f + \fr 1.11 \ft he goats: Heb. great he goats\f*

When ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, who hath \w required|strong="H1245"\w* this at your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, to \w tread|strong="H7429"\w* my \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*?\f + \fr 1.12 \ft to appear: Heb. to be seen\f*

\w Bring|strong="H0935"\w* no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \w oblations|strong="H4503"\w*; \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* is an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* unto me; the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w* and \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, the \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* of \w assemblies|strong="H4744"\w*, I cannot away \w with|strong="H3201"\w*; \add it is\add* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, even the solemn \w meeting|strong="H6116"\w*.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft iniquity: or, grief\f*

Your new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w* and your appointed \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w*: they are a \w trouble|strong="H2960"\w* unto me; I am \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \add them\add*.

And when ye spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* your \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, I will \w hide|strong="H5956"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* from you: yea, when ye make \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w prayers|strong="H8605"\w*, I will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*: your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* are \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.\f + \fr 1.15 \ft make…: Heb. multiply prayer\f*\f + \fr 1.15 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

¶ \w Wash|strong="H7364"\w* you, make you \w clean|strong="H2135"\w*; put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* of your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* from \w before|strong="H5048"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*; \w cease|strong="H2308"\w* to do \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*;

\w Learn|strong="H3925"\w* to do \w well|strong="H3190"\w*; \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w relieve|strong="H0833"\w* the \w oppressed|strong="H2541"\w*, \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* for the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*.\f + \fr 1.17 \ft relieve: or, righten\f*

Come \w now|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us reason \w together|strong="H3198"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: though your \w sins|strong="H2399"\w* be as \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, they shall be as \w white|strong="H3835"\w* as \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*; though they be \w red|strong="H0119"\w* like \w crimson|strong="H8438"\w*, they shall be as \w wool|strong="H6785"\w*.
If ye be \w willing|strong="H0014"\w* and \w obedient|strong="H8085"\w*, ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w good|strong="H2898"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*:

But if ye \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* and \w rebel|strong="H4784"\w*, ye shall be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: for the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

¶ How is the \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w* become an \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*! it was \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* in it; but now \w murderers|strong="H7523"\w*.
Thy \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* is become \w dross|strong="H5509"\w*, thy \w wine|strong="H5435"\w* \w mixed|strong="H4107"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*:

Thy \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \add are\add* \w rebellious|strong="H5637"\w*, and \w companions|strong="H2270"\w* of \w thieves|strong="H1590"\w*: every one \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w*, and \w followeth|strong="H7291"\w* after \w rewards|strong="H8021"\w*: they \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* not the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, neither doth the \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* of the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto them.

Therefore \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the mighty \w One|strong="H0046"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Ah|strong="H1945"\w*, I will \w ease|strong="H5162"\w* me of mine \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*, and \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* me of mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*:

¶ And I will \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon thee, and \w purely|strong="H1253"\w* purge \w away|strong="H6884"\w* thy \w dross|strong="H5509"\w*, and take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* all thy \w tin|strong="H0913"\w*:\f + \fr 1.25 \ft purely: Heb. according to pureness\f*

And I will \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* as at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, and thy \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* as at the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w*: \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* thou shalt be \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, The \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, the \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*.

\w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* shall be \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* with \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and her \w converts|strong="H7725"\w* with \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.\f + \fr 1.27 \ft her…: or, they that return of her\f*

¶ And the \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* of the \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w* and of the \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* \add shall be\add* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, and they that \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.\f + \fr 1.28 \ft destruction: Heb. breaking\f*

For they shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* of the \w oaks|strong="H0352"\w* which ye have \w desired|strong="H2530"\w*, and ye shall be \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w* for the \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w* that ye have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*.
For ye shall be as an \w oak|strong="H0424"\w* whose \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* \w fadeth|strong="H5034"\w*, and as a \w garden|strong="H1593"\w* that hath no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And the \w strong|strong="H2634"\w* shall be as \w tow|strong="H5296"\w*, and the \w maker|strong="H6467"\w* of it as a \w spark|strong="H5213"\w*, and they shall \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, and none shall \w quench|strong="H3518"\w* \add them\add*.\f + \fr 1.31 \ft maker…: or, and his work\f*
